priorVersion.title: CDISC SEND Challenge Agent Category Response Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C158120

self.title: CDISC SEND Challenge Agent Category Response Terminology

definition: Terminology related to classifications that describe and group the challenge agent.
name: Challenge Agent Category Response
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Challenge Agent Category Response Terminology

terms.definition: A challenge agent comprising an organism or infectious agent.
A challenge agent comprising a non-radioactive chemical or elemental substance; this category includes biotoxins.
A challenge agent that emits ionizing radiation.
